info.name: ADB Backup Enabled
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects if android:allowBackup is set to true in AndroidManifest.xml.
info.remediation: Set android:allowBackup to 'false' in AndroidManifest.xml to prevent unauthorized backups.

info.name: Insecure APK Configuration - apktool.yml
author: mohammad
info.description: Flags insecure SDK versions, shared libraries, or compressed native files in apktool.yml

info.name: Android Debug Enabled
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects if the 'android:debuggable' attribute is set to 'true' in the AndroidManifest.xml, which can expose the app to reverse engineering and security vulnerabilities.
info.remediation: Set 'android:debuggable' to 'false' in the production version of your app to prevent unauthorized debugging.

info.name: Android Custom Permissions
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects the use of custom permissions that may be overly permissive or misconfigured.

info.name: Android Explicit Exported Component Detection
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects explicitly exported Android components (Activity, Service, Receiver, Provider).

info.name: Android Implicitly Exported Components (via Intent Filter)
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects Android components that are implicitly exported by having intent-filters but no `android:exported` attribute.

info.name: Exported ContentProvider Detection
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects exported ContentProviders that may be vulnerable to unauthorized data access.

info.name: Android Hardcoded Sensitive Strings Detection
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects hardcoded sensitive strings in Smali code, such as keys, credentials, secrets, tokens, and passwords — based on keyword patterns.

info.name: Android Hardcoded Sensitive Strings Detection
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects hardcoded sensitive strings in Smali code, such as keys, credentials, secrets, tokens, and passwords — based on keyword patterns.

info.name: WebView loadUrl Usage
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects usage of WebView's `loadUrl()` method, which may lead to XSS or loading of malicious web content.
info.remediation: Avoid loading untrusted URLs. Always sanitize user input before calling loadUrl.

info.name: Android Hardcoded Sensitive Strings Detection
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects hardcoded sensitive strings in Smali code, such as keys, credentials, secrets, tokens, and passwords — based on keyword patterns.

info.name: Android Hardcoded Sensitive Strings Detection
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects hardcoded sensitive strings in Smali code, such as keys, credentials, secrets, tokens, and passwords — based on keyword patterns.

info.name: Android Hardcoded Sensitive Strings Detection
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects hardcoded sensitive strings in Smali code, such as keys, credentials, secrets, tokens, and passwords — based on keyword patterns.

info.name: Insecure External File Storage (/storage/emulated/0)
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects storage of sensitive data in external storage (e.g., /sdcard), which can be accessed by other apps.

info.name: Insecure Internal File Storage (dataDir)
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects insecure plaintext storage of sensitive data inside app’s internal directory (`/data/data/<package>/`) using Java File APIs.

info.name: Insecure Internal SQLite Storage
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects plaintext storage of sensitive data in internal SQLite using raw SQL.

info.name: Insecure Internal SQLite Storage
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects plaintext storage of sensitive data in internal SQLite using raw SQL.

info.name: Android Hardcoded Sensitive Strings Detection
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects hardcoded sensitive strings in Smali code, such as keys, credentials, secrets, tokens, and passwords — based on keyword patterns.

info.name: Android Hardcoded Sensitive Strings Detection
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects hardcoded sensitive strings in Smali code, such as keys, credentials, secrets, tokens, and passwords — based on keyword patterns.

info.name: Insecure ipc communication
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects insecure inter-process communication (IPC) mechanisms, including exported activities, services, content providers, and broadcast receivers without permission protection.

info.name: Insecure JNI Usage with User Input
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects when user input is passed into a JNI method, which could lead to native code vulnerabilities if not properly sanitized.
info.remediation:
Sanitize and validate all inputs before passing to JNI.
Avoid calling native code directly with user-controlled data.

info.name: Android Sensitive Data in Log Files - Strict
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects logging of sensitive information, such as passwords, tokens, or API keys, which can expose user credentials or other secrets.

author: mohammad
info.description: Detects logging of sensitive information, such as passwords, tokens, or API keys, which can expose user credentials or other secrets.

info.name: Android SDK Version Validation
author: mohammad
info.description:
Detects missing or misconfigured `minSdkVersion` and `targetSdkVersion` in AndroidManifest.xml or Gradle files.
Proper configuration is necessary to enforce security measures from newer Android versions.

info.name: Insecure Use of SharedPreferences for Sensitive Data
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects any usage of SharedPreferences or its Editor in Android apps — often an insecure storage method when used without encryption.

info.name: Insecure Use of SharedPreferences for Sensitive Data
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects any usage of SharedPreferences or its Editor in Android apps — often an insecure storage method when used without encryption.

info.name: Android SQL Injection Detection
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects improper neutralization of special elements in SQL commands, which can lead to SQL injection vulnerabilities.

info.name: Android Exposed JNI Function Detection
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects exposed JNI functions in Smali code, including native method declarations and dynamic native library loading.
